en.title: The Shift to Messaging for Sales
en.description: Emails are prehistoric compared to messaging. Messaging is real-time, and it’s engaging and fun. But before you know it, the fun can get out of hand — suddenly, you have an overwhelming and messy messaging inbox. How can you keep track of all of your conversations?
en.brief: You have an overwhelming and messy messaging inbox. How can you keep track of all of your conversations?
en.imageCaption: How can you keep track of all of your conversations?

en.title: Frustrated with Trying to Tame a Gazillion WhatsApp Chats?
en.description: Working in sales is challenging, no doubt. But it's also very rewarding. Excelling in sales requires relationship building — a fundamental human skill. In business, of course, the decision-makers we encounter are human, so trust matters when someone is deciding whether or not to buy your product.
en.brief: The decision-makers we encounter are human, so trust matters when someone is deciding whether or not to buy your product.
en.imageCaption: Relationship building is an overused term, but it’s at the core of salesmanship.
